text: allah allatavarrai(t tankalukkup) patukavalarkalaka etuttuk kolpavarkalukku utaranam cilantip pucciyin utaranam ponratu atu (tanakkaka) oru vittaik kattiyatu anal niccayamaka vitukalilellam mikavum palahinamanatu cilantippucciyin viteyakum - itai avarkal arintu kontirupparkalayin (tankal inaiyaka etuttuk kontavarrin palahinattai arivarkal)
